chapter.title: Examples
chapter.para: The source code of the framework can be downloaded using GIT from here
There you will find the mss-arquillian-showcase module with some useful examples.

formalpara.title: SimpleShootistTest
formalpara.para: This example demonstrates to work with manually managed test archive and the use of Arquillian Deployer tool. Also you will see how to work with manualy mode container and how to pass context parameters in some of the test methods.
The example is available for Tomcat 7 container also.

formalpara.title: SimpleShootmeTest
formalpara.para: For this example the framework will manage the test archive and decide when to deploy/undeploy. Also the container can be left to auto mode, since we don't need to manually control it (to pass context parameters or change any of the container's configuration for example).
The example is available for Tomcat 7 container also.
